column1: '''Retarded Creatures and Caverns''' is a parody of [[the Lord of the Rings]] and the sequel of [[An Everyday Tale of a Seeker of Gold]].<ref name= "Tolkien Games">[http://www.lysator.liu.se/tolkien-games/entry/retarded.html Tolkien Games] (retrieved 29 December 2010)</ref> It wasn't part of [[the Balrogian Trilogy]], but was included in the collections ''Best of the Indies Vol. 1'', ''Balrog's Big Four'' and ''Numero Dos''. The author of the game was [[John Wilson]].<ref name="Tolkien Games"/><ref>[http://www.worldofspectrum.org/infoseek.cgi Retarded Creatures and Caverns] at [[wikipedia:World of Spectrum
column2: World of Spectrum]] (retrieved 29 December 2010)</ref><ref>[http://www.meristation.com/v3/des_articulo.php?pic=CON&id=2254&idj=&idp=&tipo=art&c=1&pos=4 Meristation, El Anillo interactivo] p. 4 (retrieved 29 December 2010)</ref>

column1: In this game ''Bulbo'''s old friend ''Algernon'', also called ''Stroller'', must investigate the castle named ''Toidi'' and kill the dragon living in the castle.<ref name="Tolkien Games"/>
